WELCOME.TITLE: who told you that manage gym was that difficult?
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: We give you all the keys to manage your gym.

SLIDES.TEXT_1: Our interface is intuitive and easy to understand.
SLIDES.TEXT_2: We offer you a level of customization avanced to manage your clients.
SLIDES.TEXT_3: See easily the evolution of your gym in time and about everything.

LANDING.TITLE: Gyms are managed here.
LANDING.DESCRIPTION_2: All the necessary tools to manage your gym.
LANDING.DESCRIPTION_3: The informations you need, nothing more.

BROWSER.TITLE: No software to download
BROWSER.DESCRIPTION:
Welcome in the 21th century! No need to download anything, Sheaker is available directly on browser.
All your datas are saved safely in the cloud. You will never have a loss of informations if your computer don't work anymore.

EVERYWHERE.TITLE: Available everywhere
EVERYWHERE.DESCRIPTION: You can administrate your gym even from your house! Even if you live in Antarctic or in deep Amazon Jungle you just need an internet connection and a computer, tablet or smartphone.

FEATURES.TITLE: The funny thing, we can't put them all.

MANAGE.TITLE: Manage
MANAGE.DESCRIPTION: A more effective and easy way to manage your clients and theirs payments.

INFORM.TITLE: Inform
INFORM.DESCRIPTION: Advise your customers at any time by sending them multiple kind of messages (mail, SMS...).

SCHEDULE.TITLE: Schedule
SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Handle the gym schedule easily. Add training sessions and different events in few clicks.

STATS.TITLE: Stats
STATS.DESCRIPTION: Get a lot of nice statistics and graphics about your gym. Peak of attendance, monthly gains... and more.

CLOSE.TITLE: Don't loose contact
CLOSE.DESCRIPTION: Keep your customers close to the gym by making them downloading our application.

BUSINESS.TITLE: Business
BUSINESS.DESCRIPTION: Keep a record of all your customers payments. Who pay, how much, and when.

MUSIC.TITLE: Music
MUSIC.DESCRIPTION: Motive your clients when they here by letting them picking their favorite music!

PRODUCT.TITLE: The essential, nothing more.
PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: We make everything to answer your needs

CLIENTS.TITLE: Clients
CLIENTS.DESCRIPTION:
The management of your clients become very easy.
All you need: add a client, edit, view...

GYM.TITLE: Gym
GYM.DESCRIPTION: All your gym datas are saved, consult them everywhere and at any time.

MONEY.TITLE: Incomes
MONEY.DESCRIPTION: No need anymore to use the calculator, we will handle the accounting and provide you statistics about your gym evolution.

ERGONOMICS.TITLE: Ergonomic
ERGONOMICS.DESCRIPTION: Sheaker interface has been designed to be used by any one. No need to be a informatic genius to understand how it work.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security
SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: All your datas are saved safely in our servers. Your connections are also secure thanks to a SSL certificate, the same thing used by bank's o governement's websites.
